Module com.example.breakout_clone
Package com.example.breakout_clone.controller.sprite

Class BallController

java.lang.Object
com.example.breakout_clone.controller.sprite.SpriteController
com.example.breakout_clone.controller.sprite.BallController
public class BallController extends SpriteController
Controller class for the Ball view. The class creates the binding of the view properties to the respective model properties. The class handles all the update request to the BallModel class and calls the appropriate function.
Author:
Praket Chavan

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initialises the connection between the model and view by binding the view and model properties.
      Initialises the radius property by getting the ball views size
